page.title: Does MyCrypto support Bitcoin or other coins (LTC, STEEM, ZEC)?

breadcrumbs.title: Does MyCrypto support Bitcoin or other coins (LTC, STEEM, ZEC)?

childMarkdownRemark.html:
MyCrypto supports ETH, ETC, all testnet networks (Ropsten, Kovan, Rinkeby), any other Ethereum-based network (UBQ, EXP, POA etc.) and any Ethereum Standard Tokens - aka "ERC-20" tokens.

You can use Shapeshift.io or another exchange to swap / convert / exchange your other coins into ETH or Ethereum tokens. However, you do not send those other coins directly to your Ethereum address.

We recommend Exodus.io as a client-side, multi-coin solution.

MyCrypto supports a lot of ERC-20 tokens by default, however, any missing ERC-20 token can easily be added to your local interface by following these instructions.
